concept.title: User management
concept.shortdesc: is a web application and has a user management.

section.title: Login screen
section.p:
The login screen is displayed if you are using a supported browser login screen
Login screen
You need to enter your user name and password for the project.
For example, enter John in the field. will ask for the password.

section.title: How to get credentials
section.p: Contact your system administrator for credentials.
Do not attempt to contact Applied Maths.
